pr_title: Add more error message for Presto-on-Spark

timeline.message: Add more error message for Presto-on-Spark

timeline.bodyText:
@arhimondr : OSS Spark use "Executor heartbeat timed out". However, when fb-spark backports apache/spark@b5c35d6. they use a slightly different exception message "Unable to talk to the executor".
But seems both are quite self-explained, I feel no hurt to use both of them.
timeline.author: wenleix
